channel.title: The Last of Us
channel.description:
Review embargos are off and perfect scores are just coming out of the wazoo.
[url='https://t.co/JsOctLljA1']OPM[/url] – 10/10 [url='https://www.eurogamer.net/articles/2013-06-05-the-last-of-us-review']Eurogamer[/url] – 10/10 [url='https://www.computerandvideogames.com/409703/the-last-of-us-review-survival-horror-masterpiece-is-naughty-dogs-finest-moment/']CVG[/url] – 10/10 [url='https://uk.ign.com/articles/2013/06/05/the-last-of-us-review?utm_campaign=ign+main+twitter&utm_source=twitter&utm_medium=social']IGN[/url] – 10/10 [url='https://kotaku.com/the-last-of-us-the-kotaku-review-511292998?utm_campaign=Socialflow_Kotaku_Twitter&utm_source=Kotaku_Twitter&utm_medium=Socialflow']Kotaku[/url] – ‘Yes’ [url='https://www.thesixthaxis.com/2013/06/05/review-the-last-of-us/']TheSixthAxis[/url] – 10/10 [url='https://t.co/fzx5UDh23n']Shacknews[/url] – ‘No Score’ [url='https://www.destructoid.com/review-the-last-of-us-255287.phtml']Destructoid[/url] – 10/10 [url='https://www.nowgamer.com/ps3/ps3-reviews/1952400/the_last_of_us_review.html']NowGamer[/url] – 8.5/10 [url='https://www.videogamer.com/reviews/the_last_of_us_review.html']Videogamer[/url] – 10/10 [url='https://www.polygon.com/game/the-last-of-us/3040']Polygon[/url] – 7.5/10 [url='https://www.digitalspy.co.uk/gaming/review/a487340/the-last-of-us-review-ps3-a-beautiful-world-with-a-compelling-story.html']Digital Spy[/url] – 5/5 [url='https://www.edge-online.com/review/the-last-of-us-review/']Edge[/url] – 10/10 [url='https://www.gamespot.com/the-last-of-us/reviews/the-last-of-us-review-6409197/?tag=Topslot;Slot1']Gamespot[/url] – 8/10 [url='https://www.godisageek.com/2013/06/the-last-of-us-review/']GodIsAGeek[/url] – 10/10 [url='https://www.pushsquare.com/reviews/ps3/last_of_us']Push Square[/url] – 10/10 [url='https://www.newgamenetwork.com/article/839/the-last-of-us-review/']New Game Network[/url] – 83/100 [url='https://gamingbolt.com/the-last-of-us-review']GamingBolt[/url] – 10/10 [url='https://www.giantbomb.com/reviews/the-last-of-us-review/1900-580/']GiantBomb[/url] – 5/5 [url='https://www.zing.cz/recenze/1014/the-last-of-us-postapokalypticke-dej-vu']Zing.cz[/url] – 8/10 [url='https://www.shopto.net/news/42982/The-Last-of-Us-Review']ShopTo[/url] – No Score
[url]https://www.vg247.com/2013/06/05/the-last-of-us-reviews-are-go-all-the-scores-inside/[/url]
I cannot fucking wait for the 14th much longer.
(This a PS3 exclusive game, for the sake of no derails.)

item.title: The Last of Us
item.dc:creator: JeffMOD
item.description:
Well, it was very good. And this is coming from someone who neither plays third person games nor games on playstation.

But getting pissed because a reviewer has a differing opinion or found a couple of flaws is just silly. In fact, the second should be commended, because it’s quite hard. I only found, like, one noticeable thing in the first 3rd of the game. (All I got to play through)

Them melee weapons. Brittle as glass.

Read full topic

item.title: The Last of Us
item.dc:creator: Jack_Freeman
item.description:
The fans are really throwing me off. The kind who constantly scream like little children when the game is given anything less than a 10/10. I mean, such people are with all games, but it’s just hard to ignore them here since there’re even more than usual.

Read full topic

item.title: The Last of Us
item.dc:creator: Awesomeness
item.description:
Well, you can always buy a ps3 for the new Metal Gear collection too. I’m really thinking about it, because i really want to play Last of Us… I thought the scores for Infinite seemed a bit over the top, but i changed my mind as soon as i played that game.

Read full topic

item.title: The Last of Us
item.dc:creator: GilCMassey
item.description:
I like never play with others xD unless I’m at their place. I used to be PC IS MASTERRACE as well, but then it got outa date, and I didn’t feel like updating. Then we got a xbox360 and it’s been fun. A games a game really, the only bummer with consoles is that it’s pretty set in graphics.

Read full topic

item.title: The Last of Us
item.dc:creator: TheeGoatPig
item.description:
Maxey:

Since when is having friends a requirement for owning a console?

It opens up games that I wouldn’t normally play, that are only fun with multiple people in the same room playing them having a good time.

Read full topic

item.title: The Last of Us
item.dc:creator: Maxey
item.description:
Since when is having friends a requirement for owning a console?

Read full topic

item.title: The Last of Us
item.dc:creator: TheeGoatPig
item.description:
0_22one:

I’ve played RDR it’s also on Xbox360. However, I won’t limit myself, I’ve always been interested in Uncharted and Heavy Rain. The Last Of Us, however, is what’s really sparked my interest in the PS3. And then Phantom Pain makes me want a PS4.

I said console only. I don’t own any consoles. Just a PC. I’m not against owning one, but I would need a lot of things in my life to change to get me to buy one (having friends would be a good first step).

Read full topic

item.title: The Last of Us
item.dc:creator: Jack_Freeman
item.description:
I’m kinda sad that I bought a Xbox 360 because the exclusives on it doesn’t interest me. I should’ve bought a Playstation, but I’m too poor to do that now.

Read full topic

item.title: The Last of Us
item.dc:creator: TheeGoatPig
item.description:
Maxey:

Don’t limit yourself to just the one game tho. Get Red Dead Redemption too. And Heavy Rain. And the Uncharted trilogy. And the HD PS2 Collections. And so on…

Red Dead Redemption is the only console only game I want right now. Every other game I want is on or coming to PC.

I don’t want The Last Of Us.

Read full topic

item.title: The Last of Us
item.dc:creator: DenDrio
item.description:
I rented TLOU from redbox for about 2 days and I fucking loved it. The story was amazing, albeit somewhat predictable. The characters seemed realistic enough to the point where the player connects with them. The gameplay had enough action and stealth that made me regret every shot I missed.

I haven’t played its multiplayer due to the limited time I had with it, but I watched some videos of it on youtube. One of the gamemodes is similar to TDM and each player has the ability to listen like Joel and see other players when they move. Once killed, you cannot respawn until the next round. In my opinion, it only looks fun if you have buds to play with.

Read full topic

item.title: The Last of Us

item.title: The Last of Us
item.dc:creator: GilCMassey
item.description:
I could live with either, as long as it’s not too far in the future. Guess I’ll just get a PS3 for now, eventually. I heard its beyond fantastic, but I haven’t looked into it. I want to experience it fully.

Read full topic

item.title: The Last of Us
item.dc:creator: Maxey
item.description:
No direct backwards compatibility with any previous Playstation, sadly. Buuuuuuut it might get a re-release at some point or even just accessible through streaming. Just conjecture at this point, really.

Read full topic

item.title: The Last of Us
item.dc:creator: GilCMassey
item.description:
I have the same problem as above, I just can’t afford to get a PS3 right now. But when I can, this is one of the first things I’m getting for it. Unless the PS4 is backwards compatible, in which case I will get that and this game. Has it been confirmed whether it is or not?

Read full topic

item.title: The Last of Us
item.dc:creator: Maxey
item.description:
Serza:

They should consider making a PC version later, I’m pretty sure they would attract even more customers.

Yeah, not going to happen. This is a Sony game, they own everything in it, even the dev team is a Sony subsidiary.

Read full topic

item.title: The Last of Us
item.dc:creator: Serza
item.description:
Watched the whole playthrough. I’ve seen more moving games, IMHO… But I can’t say anything’s bad about it from watching.

Maybe just the part about the whole zombie apocalypse thing getting old. Then again, breathing can get old in the same way.

They should consider making a PC version later, I’m pretty sure they would attract even more customers.

Also, about Zing’s score… My country has always been… say… special.

Read full topic
